item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Using this code:

[code]public boolean CountDown() {
Client other = getClient(i);

	if(isRed() == true && other.isBlue() == false && isNearCoffin() == true && isInWarZone() == true || other.isRed() == false && isBlue() == true && isNearCoffin() == true && isInWarZone() == true) {
	return true; 
}else {

return false;

}
}[/code]

I get the following error:

java.lang.NullPointerException at Client.CountDown(Client.java:34) at Client.process(Client.java:11230) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:179) at Process.run(Process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
